about_the_game:
Embark on a strategic adventure in the mystical medieval world of Beyond The Walls, a 3D tower defense game that challenges you to master elemental warfare and town management.

Unique Elemental Defense System
At the core of Beyond The Walls, lies a distinctive elemental tower system featuring six core elements. Start with a single element and strategically integrate others as you upgrade your towers. Each unique combination unleashes powerful effects, crucial for repelling relentless waves of invaders. Explore the synergies between elements to maximize your defenses and turn the tide of battle in your favor.


Build and Manage Your Medieval Town
Survival hinges on the prosperity of the town you build. Erect a variety of production buildings to gather essential materials and advance your technological capabilities. Each structure contributes to your defenses and expands your strategic options.


Balance Is Key
Success requires more than just offensive might. Achieving the perfect balance between town expansion and defense enhancement is vital. Allocate resources wisely, enhance your infrastructure, and adapt your strategies to survive against increasingly formidable foes.

Key Features:

Dynamic Elemental Tower System: Combine elements to create towers with diverse, powerful effects.
In-depth Town Management: Build and upgrade various buildings to fuel your war efforts.
Strategic Resource Allocation: Carefully manage resources to develop your town and fortify its defenses.
Progressive Difficulty: As you advance, the threats grow, demanding more cunning and strategic planning.
Prepare to defend, manage, and conquer. Are you ready to rise as the ultimate medieval strategist?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 740 / AMD Radeon R7 250X
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in a 3D tower defense game set in a medieval realm. Build towers with unique effects and strategically manage your town to amass resources. Master the elements and devise cunning strategies to triumph in this captivating fusion of defense and city management.
